long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkSnap | ShortLink Buddy is a convenient Chrome extension designed to simplify the process of sharing long URLs. Whether you're sharing content on social media or sending emails, ShortLink Buddy helps you convert long URLs into short links, making sharing easier and more elegant. With just a click, you can generate a short link and copy it to your clipboard, ready to share with friends, family, and colleagues anytime, anywhere. Save time, make sharing more convenient, all with LinkSnap | ShortLink Buddy!

## Features

- Support for creating 100 links per month.
- Support 120 days of click data history.
- Support 120 days of  Country-Level data, City-Leve data, Device data, Access source data, Daily click data, and Total click data.
- Support unlimited link clicks.

# **Is it Free?**

Indeed, LinSnap | ShortLink Buddy is available for free. You can access the basic features and choose to upgrade for more functionalities.
